История успеха Asilbek Sultanbek Logisti: The success story of Asilbek Sultanbek Logistics Group
text: Every great story begins with a dream and faith in oneself. This was also true for Asilbek Sultanbek Logistics Group. In the beginning, there were only two people, one room, and an old laptop
text3: Over time, their efforts began to pay off. Gradually, they increased their client base, built a reputation as honest and effective partners, and expanded their team. The company grew from a single room to a full-fledged office, and the old laptop was replaced by modern technology that optimized processes
text4: Today, Asilbek Sultanbek Logistics Group is not just a company but a symbol of persistence and self-belief. It provides a full range of logistics services, collaborates with major clients, and remains true to its principles: honesty, professionalism, and customer care
text5: Asilbek and Alihan have proven that even the most ambitious goals are achievable if approached with heart. Their story inspires not only the company's employees but also anyone striving for more. And this is just the beginning: ahead, Asilbek Sultanbek Logistics Group has even more opportunities, goals, and successes
question_title1: What services does your company provide?
question_text1: We provide a full range of logistics services, including international and domestic transportation, warehousing, customs clearance, and cargo consolidation.
question_title2: How do you ensure the safety of the goods?
question_text2: We work only with trusted carriers, use modern tracking systems, and follow all safety measures at every stage of transportation.
question_title3: Which regions do you work with?
question_text3: Our company actively works with China, CIS countries, and Europe, providing efficient delivery solutions in the shortest possible time.
question_title4: What are the delivery times for goods?
question_text4: Delivery times depend on the type of cargo, route, and chosen mode of transport. We always strive to offer optimal delivery times and keep the client informed at every stage.
question_title5: What types of goods do you transport?
question_text5: We work with a wide range of goods, including standard, oversized, hazardous, and perishable items.
question_title6: Do you have experience working with large companies?
question_text6: Yes, we have extensive experience working with large clients. Our reputation is built on successful projects and long-term partnerships.
question_title7: Can the cargo be tracked in real-time?
question_text7: Yes, we provide cargo tracking services through modern digital platforms so that clients can be aware of their shipment's location.
question_title8: What documents are needed for transportation arrangements?
question_text8: The list of documents depends on the type of cargo and route. We provide detailed consultations and assist in preparing all the necessary paperwork.
question_title9: What benefits will I get from working with you?
question_text9: We guarantee reliability, a professional approach, tailored solutions to your needs, and transparency at all stages of cooperation.
question_title10: How can I start working with your company?
question_text10: Simply contact us in any convenient way (phone, email, or via the website). We will quickly respond to your request and offer the best solution.
advantages_text1: We understand that every business has its own needs and tasks. Therefore, we develop unique logistics solutions tailored to each client’s requests.
advantages_text2: From transportation and warehousing to cargo consolidation and customs clearance, we offer a full range of services that cover all stages of the logistics process.
advantages_text3: We have a reliable partner in China, which allows us to efficiently organize logistics, minimize costs, and ensure uninterrupted operations even in a competitive environment.
advantages_text4: Our priority is the safety of your cargo. We guarantee compliance with all safety standards and closely monitor the quality of transportation.
advantages_text5: We always find optimal routes and delivery methods to reduce travel time without compromising service quality.
advantages_text6: All information about terms, costs, and conditions of cooperation is provided openly and honestly. We build long-term relationships based on trust and transparency.
advantages_text7: We are always in touch, resolve issues promptly, and strive to make the cooperation process as convenient and comfortable as possible for the client.
advantages_text8: We find ways to reduce logistics costs without compromising quality, helping clients effectively manage their budgets.

vacancy_text: Asilbek Sultanbek Logistics Group is a young and dynamically developing logistics company in Kazakhstan. We specialize in road transportation and offer cargo delivery services from China, Europe, CIS countries, as well as local routes within the country.
Ведущий специалист отдела логистики: Lead Specialist of the Logistics Department
text1: Asilbek Sultanbek Logistics Group is one of the young logistics companies in Kazakhstan. We offer logistics services in the field of road transportation, covering destinations such as China, Europe, CIS countries, and local deliveries. We are a reliable partner in the world of logistics, specializing in providing comprehensive solutions for your business. We understand that our clients' businesses require reliability, speed, and security. That is why our solutions are based on optimizing logistics processes, transparency, and an individual approach to each task.
text2: The founder of the company, Asilbek Sultanbek, is an energetic and young entrepreneur. Despite his young age (29 years), he has faced many health-related challenges. In 2006, at the age of 11, he was diagnosed with rheumatoid arthritis, which led to the complete dysfunction of his body. He was unable to walk or function independently. After a difficult path of treatment, and thanks to his faith, he was able to regain a healthy lifestyle. By the age of 21, he enrolled at NARXOZ University, where he leads an active student life. He has won 1st places in chess competitions and twice won IT Hackathons. His persistence and innovative thinking have led him to realize many projects.
